author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Here Are All the Lip Colors Anastasia Wore in Fifty Shades Darker Since That Was the Best Part of the Movie
text:
In the total garbage that is Fifty Shades Darker , one very beautiful thing stands out: Anastasia's lips. I didn't read the book, so I'm not sure if her lips are supposed to be a thing you notice about Ana or not. But honestly, the movie should really just be called Fifty Shades of Ana's Lipstick because after seeing her makeup, I now want to buy all of her lip products.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Luckily, the movie's makeup artist Evelyne Noraz listed the products she used for each notable lipstick moment on her Instagram, so now you and I actually can buy them. If you haven't seen the movie yet, I'd say save the 20 bucks you would spend on a ticket and use it pick up one of the below lip products instead.
Ana's Everyday Berry Lip
